name: Loading... please wait
description:
What if loading spinners were alive? Find out in this unique adventure game!

My JimJam #2 entry, and first ever game-jam entry!

----- Assets -----

No pre-made or store assets were used. Only stock Unity3D was used to create this game. Everything was coded by me, Martin Hindenes (solo project).

----- Visuals -----

All visuals in the game are either created by myself or come bundled with Unity3D.

----- Sounds -----

All sounds and music used in the game are freely available online, except a couple of sound effects which I created using Bfxr. Some sounds were tweaked in Audacity.
«Orchestral Strings, Warm» by InspectorJ (License)
«Crystal bowl hit F3 1» by caiogracco (CC0)
«Snowfall final» by ShadyDave (License: NC-3.0)

Sources: Freesound.org, Bfxr

----- Fonts -----
Roboto Mono (Google Fonts)
